events.message: The customer filed a claim reporting a car accident involving their vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to collision damage reported.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to guide the customer through the claim process.
The claim was acknowledged promptly, and the customer was informed that investigations would start soon.
The insurance company requested supporting documents including photos of the damaged car and police report.
The customer submitted the requested documents, including detailed pictures and an official police accident report.
The investigation into the collision details and liability began to validate the claim and assess damages.
The investigation concluded successfully confirming fault and the extent of the vehicle damage.
A fair settlement was proposed covering all repairs and associated costs as per the policy terms.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the clear communication and timely settlement offer.
The claim was formally approved following acceptance of the settlement proposal by the customer.
Payment for the approved claim was issued to the customer promptly to cover vehicle repair expenses.
The claim case was officially closed after payment confirmation and final communication with the customer.
All claim documents and related files were archived securely for future reference and compliance.
